description: Transactions Report: A detailed log of all transactions, including payments, refunds, and adjustments. This can be used to reconcile accounts and understand individual transaction details.
Balance Report: Shows the current balance, including pending and available funds, in various currencies. It may include a breakdown of transactions contributing to the balance.
Subscription Analytics Report: Offers insights into subscription-based revenue, churn rates, average revenue per user (ARPU), and other subscription-related metrics.
